text.text: I am Dr Paleontologist of Villager University. I have, since my childhood, studied the ancient creatures of our world. Now, I have compiled my works into a single book. available at your local paleontologist's trades.

Some of this information may be lacking due to the limited finds of certain creatures. Other's have lots of information. I have compiled my works into a easy-to-read and understandable format, with omisions of certain ideas.
